title: FS:  T206 Wheat w/Tolstoi Back  $65 --- SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Wheat w/Tolstoi Back  $65 --- SOLD
posts.post_content:
T206 Zach Wheat, Tolstoi back.   $65 delivered.  Paypal please. --- SOLD

This card has the added bonus that if you happen to be looking at its back and forget which player is depicted on the front, a previous owner was kind enough to write Zach Wheat in pencil at the top.  You just don't see that kind of consideration much these days.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]
Is that a special over-inback print?
